author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan over a high heat. Add the turkey and fry for 2-3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown.  Add the leeks and garlic to the pan for 2-3 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients simmer to reduce and thicken the sauce. To serve, remove the sauce from pan and eat alone or with a bowl of steaming rice.
ingredients: 1 tbsp vegetable oil,  110g/4oz turkey breast, finely chopped,  ½ leek, roughly chopped,  1 garlic clove, crushed,  1 x 400g/14oz can cherry tomatoes, drained,  2 tbsp white wine vinegar,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  bowl of rice, cooked according to packet instructions
